statements.quote: We got great legislation. You ever hear of these liars back there, where they say, but Trump hasn't gotten -- I think we've gotten more in a short period of time, in this seven months, I think we've gotten more than anybody, including Harry Truman, who was number one, but they will tell you we've got none.
We’ve signed more bills -- and I’m talking about through the legislature -- than any President ever.  For a while, Harry Truman had us, and now I think we have everybody, Mike.

name: Trump signed more bills than any other recent President
